name: TheDairyGodmotherFlavorForecast
0:
”Alexa, ask Flavor Forecast what is the flavor forecast today?”
”Alexa, ask Flavor Forecast for the flavor of the day on August 21, 2017”
”Alexa, ask Flavor Forecast is The Dairy Godmother open?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: flavor forecast
des:
Flavor Forecast provides the flavor of the day information for The Dairy Godmother. Just ask Alexa for the flavor of the day today, tomorrow or any other day past or present. If it is available on the Dairy Godmother's calendar, Flavor Forecast will find it!

Flavor Forecast also provides important store information. Just ask Alexa if The Dairy Godmother is open or closed. Even ask if The Dairy Godmother was or is open on a particular day in the past or future. 

When asking Flavor Forecast questions containing future or past days, be sure to specify the month name and year in your request to help Alexa recognize the date you're asking for.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
